title: Engineering C.Edge Option Reflective Learning I
prereqCoreqText: Permission of the GCS is required.

title: Engineering C.Edge Option Reflective Learning II
prereqCoreqText: The following course must be completed previously: ENGR 108. Permission of the GCS is required.

title: Applied Ordinary Differential Equations
prereqCoreqText: The following course must be completed previously or concurrently: MATH 204 (Cegep Mathematics 105). The following course must be completed previously: MATH 205 (Cegep Mathematics 203).

title: Applied Advanced Calculus
prereqCoreqText: The following course must be completed previously: MATH 204 (Cegep Mathematics 105); MATH 205 (Cegep Mathematics 203).

title: Statics
prereqCoreqText: The following course must be completed previously or concurrently: ENGR 213. The following courses must be completed previously PHYS 204; MATH 204.

title: Dynamics
prereqCoreqText: The following courses must be completed previously: ENGR 213, ENGR 242.

title: Mechanics of Materials
prereqCoreqText: The following courses must be completed previously: ENGR 213; ENGR 242 or ENGR 245. The following courses must be completed previously or concurrently: ENGR 233.

title: Mechanical Analysis
prereqCoreqText: The following course must be completed previously: PHYS 204. The following course must be completed previously or concurrently: ENGR 213.

title: Thermodynamics I
prereqCoreqText: The following course must be completed previously: MATH 203 (Cegep Mathematics 103).

title: Introductory Engineering Team Design Project
prereqCoreqText: The following courses must be completed previously: COEN 243; ENCS 282; ENGR 213, ENGR 233.

title: Engineering C.Edge Option Reflective Learning III
prereqCoreqText: The following course must be completed previously: ENGR 208. Permission of the GCS is required.

title: Transform Calculus and Partial Differential Equations
prereqCoreqText: The following courses must be completed previously: ENGR 213, ENGR 233.

title: Fluid Mechanics I
prereqCoreqText: The following courses must be completed previously: ENGR 213, ENGR 233, ENGR 251.

title: Probability and Statistics in Engineering
prereqCoreqText: The following courses must be completed previously: ENGR 213, ENGR 233.

title: Numerical Methods in Engineering
prereqCoreqText: The following courses must be completed previously: ENGR 213, ENGR 233; COMP 248 or COEN 243 or MECH 215 or MIAE 215 or BCEE 231.

title: Impact of Technology on Society
prereqCoreqText: The following courses must be completed previously: ENCS 282; ENGR 201, ENGR 202.

title: Special Technical Report
prereqCoreqText: The following course must be completed previously: ENCS 282. Permission of the Department is required.

title: Honours Research Project
prereqCoreqText: The following course must be completed previously: ENCS 282. Students must complete a minimum 75 credits in the BEng program with a cumulative GPA of 3.00 or better prior to enrolling. Permission of the Department is required.

title: Robot Manipulators
prereqCoreqText: The following course must be completed previously: ELEC 372 or MECH 371.

title: Multidisciplinary Capstone Design Project
prereqCoreqText: Students must be eligible to register in one of the following courses: AERO 490; BLDG 490; CIVI 490; COEN 490; ELEC 490; INDU 490; MECH 490; COMP 490 or SOEN 490.

title: Topics in Engineering
prereqCoreqText: Permission of the GCS is required.
